entries.entry: We talked about some basic bash commands for terminal.
Met big sibling Connor. He gave me a heads up to be sure to pay attention closely to GIT
We learned the basics of git and were put into groups for our group project. I was on the pomelos
We learned about some methods to work with arrays. Apparently map is going to be suport important so I should do some more research on it
We had a lot of lab time today, which was well needed! I was able to start my Daily Journal project over and make some progress
We worked on a project that was all about working with arrays and representing them on the DOM
Today we were introduced to databases and the impotance of entity relationship diagrams
Today we worked on our understanding of ERDs and looked at some json-server api call methods. Then, we looked at the way Brenda laid out her Lego project to see how that all worked!
Today, I was able to add the ability to delete entries to my Daily Journal project. Since I had done this before, it was super easy and only took about 20 minutes. Hooray!
Today Brenda showed us how the update portion of CRUD!
